message: Let's imagine we have a ruleset with a global block and two rules : rule1 and rule2. Global block emits some javascript and the rules too. The rules fire on any page.

Do we have any guarantee that the js code emitted in the global block gets executed before the one in rule1 or rule2? Same question with the code emitted in rule1, will it be executed before the one in rule2 if rule1 is declared before rule2 ?
I didn't mean to be rude :-)
The js wool be run in order of executing rules, with the global block before any of the rule js.
